$$p(\pi|y) \propto p(y|\pi)p(\pi) $$

$$= Binomial(n,\pi) \cdot Beta(\alpha, \beta) $$
$$ {n \choose y}\pi^y (1-\pi)^{n-y} \frac{\Gamma(\alpha+\beta)}{\Gamma(\alpha)\Gamma(\beta)}\pi^{(\alpha-1)}(1-\pi)^{(\beta-1)} $$

$$\propto \pi^y(1-\pi)^{(n-y)}\pi^{(\alpha-1)}(1-\pi)^{(\beta-1)} $$

$$ p(\pi|y) \propto \pi^{(y+\alpha-1)}(1-\pi)^{(n-y+\beta-1)}$$
The posterior distribution is $Beta(y+\alpha, n-y+\beta)$
